content: Hi, any one using Synthea patient generator with Azure FHIR API server and/or Vonk FHIR server ? Thanks

Hi @Nilesh Pagare , we use the pregenerated Synthea dataset to load data into Vonk, e.g. for our performance tests. For easy loading we provide and use Vonk Loader (currently R3, multiversion support is out soon) and Locust (see Firely's project Wind Tunnel) for the actual loading.
